messages.content:
Labour can't win in Romsey and Southampton North. It's so close here! Only a few votes separate Sandra Gidley from the Conservative and next time, the result could be even closer.
But whatever happens nationally, Labour is out of the race in Romsey and Southampton North. Voting Labour or staying at home could mean a Conservative MP for our area.
People who want someone who will always put local people first will be backing Sandra to win.
Only Sandra Gidley can beat the Conservatives.
Who will work hard for Bassett and Swaythling?
